des: "An alternative ham and cheese sandwich that uses miso and wasabi instead of the traditional mustard and mayonnaise to give it a zesty flavor."
ins: Spread the miso paste and wasabi paste onto one side of one slice of bread. Spread the mayonnaise onto the other slice. Layer the ham, lettuce and cheese over the mayonnaise, and top with the other slice of bread, with the miso facing the inside.
